comment._content: No. 87 Pitt Street is at the corner of Bond Street. The photographer (Henry King) was in Spring Street. looking west. Google street view: maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&...

comment._content: Yes uminarampart, or whatever the back end of it is called. Google Street view - maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&...

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: The building that stands here now, Australia Square, and its architect Harry Seidler, are revered. Indeed it is far superior to contemporary examples. However his annex building on the Pitt Street end of Australia Square makes it clear he could compromise good design for commercial imperatives. It's hideous and adds nothing to anything except developer floor space. The courtyard and the main building would have sat better without it. Later at the MLC Centre he took some of those undesirable aspects a few steps further.
